name: ModeWalk
overview:
ModeWalk.com offers an immersive by-city shopping experience that goes beyond the catalog to create emotional connections between designers and consumers.

ModeWalk celebrates the world’s finest craftsmen who pour their hearts and souls into their creations. At ModeWalk, you experience the beautiful creative stories that truly set their products apart from the mass produced.

As the only Website to offer Haute Couture, we not only provide the ultimate personalized shopping experience but also extend our couture touch to the entire ModeWalk experience.

We curate the best and rare luxury brands founded by recognized veterans of top fashion houses. With qualities that benefit from being crafted in the best local workshops, ModeWalk’s products also carry timeless designs which embody the quintessential aesthetics of their home countries. Our first destination is Paris.

funding_rounds.source_description: ModeWalk Raises $1.8M in Series A Funding

external_links.title: Vogue Daily: Click for Couture:  ModeWalk Aims to Bring High Fashion to the People
